title: 'KPOP' musical set to debut on Broadway later this year - Reuters.com
description: South Korea's distinctive music genre K-pop has been turned into a musical, "KPOP", that will open on Broadway in New York later this year.

March 30 (Reuters) - South Korea's distinctive music genre K-pop has been turned into a musical, "KPOP", that will open on Broadway in New York later this year.
